## AnyEventHandlerOf type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AnyEventHandlerOf<EventMap extends DefaultEventMap> = {
    [EventType in keyof EventMap]: EventMap[EventType] extends void ? () => void : (event: EventMap[EventType]) => void;
}[keyof EventMap];
```
